name: Undertale Yellow (Demo Version)
description:
Welcome to UNDERTALE YELLOW. In this fan made prequel to the RPG UNDERTALE, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters... but will you make it out alive?

Grab your cowboy hat and your gun and take the place of Undertale’s Yellow SOUL in their journey through the Underground on an original adventure.

Features:

• Killing is unnecessary: negotiate out of danger blah blah blah - you played Undertale right?

• An all new soundtrack featuring original songs as well as a few remixes of old favorites

• Share a laugh with new friends and old

• Experience an interactive tutorial on how to count dogs

• Made by multiple people with no semblance of fusion ability

• Supply a race with free therapy services

• Wonder where the spaghetti went

Now in development!
